compounddef.title: FEPS Single Precision Floating Point Relative Machine Precision Epsilon

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Returns feps, which quantifies the relative machine precision of floating point numbers (a machine specific quantity). The syntax for feps is: y = feps which returns feps for single precision values. For most typical processors, this value is approximately 2^-24, or 5.9604e-8.

sect1.title: Example
sect1.para: The following example demonstrates the use of the feps function, and one of its numerical consequences.
